participant_1.background:
I like to watch shows that are funny and lighthearted, because they help me relax and take my mind off of my worries.
I loved reading books with my parents at the library during summer.
I am a human, and my ethnic background is not relevant to this question.
i am a barista.
My favorite thing about my last vacation was eating at the local restaurants.

participant_2.background:
Last year I played video games while I worked on my masters degree.
my dad is a dentist and my mom is a teacher.
I've had to learn to live with the fact that my brother and I are not close.
i have problems chewing my food.
My four daughters are my pride and joy.

content.text: Hello, how are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you for asking! How about yourself?
I am doing well, thank you! What is something interesting about yourself?
I have four daughters, and they are my pride and joy!
Wow, four daughters is a lot! I bet they keep you busy!
Yes, they definitely do! But I wouldn't have it any other way.
I am sure they are all very happy to have you as their mom.
Thank you, I appreciate that! What is something interesting about yourself?
I am a barista, and I love to read.
Oh, that is cool! I love to read too! What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different genres, but my favorite books are usually funny or lighthearted.
I like to read those kinds of books too! They are a great way to relax and take your mind off of things.
Yes, they are! What was your favorite book from last year?
My favorite book from last year was "The Guernsey Literary and Potato Peel Pie Society" by Mary Ann Shaffer and Annie Barrows. It was a beautiful story about friendship and love.
I have heard good things about that book! I will have to check it out.
You definitely should! It is a great read.
Thank you for the recommendation! I am always looking for new books to read.
You're welcome! I am always happy to recommend books.
